tool.name: pampa
tool.description: Performance Indicators of Marine Protected Areas for the management of coastal ecosystems, resources and their uses
tool.command:
mkdir Results ln -s /srv/shiny-server/sample-apps/PAMPA/Results Results mkdir -p /var/log/shiny-server && chown shiny.shiny /var/log/shiny-server &&
exec shiny-server >> /var/log/shiny-server.log 2>&1
tool.help: `PAMPA <https://github.com/madelinm/Package_PAMPA>`_ is a R Shiny App to facilitate production of biodiversity metrics from observation files related to species
